overview:
Authorized Zumba Shop Canada

Zumba shop Canada is the authorized distributor of Zumba Fitness® and Zumba® related equipment, Zumba® Wear and other Zumba® products for Canada and runs the website zumbashop.ca. The distributor operations and online shopping portal for Zumba shop Canada is owned and operated by Mekaden Enterprises Inc, based in Toronto, Newmarket.

Zumba shop Canada offers the entire range of Zumba® products for Canadian customers shipping from within Canada and trading according to the laws of the country.

For every Canadian loving the thrills of the purely exhilarating Zumba fitness and body-shaping program, Zumba shop Canada offers authorized and authentic products guaranteed to turn their Zumba fling into an unforgettable experience.

Zumba, the wildly popular fitness program created by Columbian fitness trainer Alberto “Beto” Perez, is today recognized as one of the best fitness programs in the world. Trainers from the Zumba Academy who are scientifically trained in human body dynamics and fitness methods have made Zumba accessible and acceptable to millions. Zumba is extremely popular in Canada, and for anyone into Zumba, Zumba shop Canada and zumbashop.ca is a must destination.

On Zumba Shop Canada at zumbashop.ca, you can easily find a Zumba class near you, or shop for Zumba products, find Zumba instructor training, find and join Zumba clubs, find individual Zumba instructors and ask for any kind of support related to Zumba in Canada.
